Title: Authentication & Account Management
Description: Automated testing for user registration login password reset and 2FA

Title: Patient Registration
Description: As a new patient I want to register for a portal account so that I can access my health information online
Acceptance Criteria: - User can register with email phone and basic info| - Email verification works| - Password security requirements enforced| - Welcome email sent| - HIPAA compliance notice accepted

Title: Patient Login
Description: As a registered patient I want to securely login to my account so that I can access my personal health information
Acceptance Criteria: - Login with email/password works| - Remember me checkbox works| - Session expires after 30 min inactivity| - Invalid credentials error handling| - Account lockout after 5 failed attempts| - MFA enforced if enabled

Title: Password Reset
Description: As a patient who forgot their password I want to reset my password securely so that I can regain access to my account
Acceptance Criteria: - Password reset via email works| - Reset link expires after 1 hour| - New password meets requirements| - Confirmation email sent| - Old password cannot be reused| - Reset link single-use only

Title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
Description: As a security-conscious patient I want to enable 2FA on my account so that my health information is more secure
Acceptance Criteria: - Enable 2FA via SMS or app| - QR code scanning works| - Backup codes provided| - 2FA required on login| - Can disable 2FA with password| - Backup codes can be regenerated

Title: Patient Profile Management
Description: Automated testing for viewing and updating patient profile information

Title: View Profile Information
Description: As a patient I want to view my profile information so that I can verify my details are correct
Acceptance Criteria: - View personal info (name DOB gender contact)| - View emergency contact| - View insurance info| - View medical history summary| - Sensitive data partially masked

Title: Update Profile Information
Description: As a patient I want to update my profile information so that my healthcare providers have current information
Acceptance Criteria: - Edit contact info| - Update emergency contact| - Update insurance info| - Password confirmation for sensitive fields| - Confirmation email sent| - Audit log created| - Form validation works

Title: Upload Profile Photo
Description: As a patient I want to upload a profile photo so that providers can easily identify me
Acceptance Criteria: - Upload JPG PNG GIF files| - 5MB file size limit| - Auto resize/crop to standard dimensions| - Can remove photo| - Content moderation

Title: Appointment Management
Description: Automated testing for viewing scheduling and managing appointments

Title: View Appointments
Description: As a patient I want to view my upcoming and past appointments so that I can keep track of my healthcare schedule
Acceptance Criteria: - View upcoming appointments| - View past appointments| - Show provider date time location type| - Calendar view available| - Filter by date range provider type| - Virtual visit links displayed

Title: Schedule New Appointment
Description: As a patient I want to schedule a new appointment online so that I don't have to call the office
Acceptance Criteria: - Select appointment type| - Select preferred provider| - View available time slots| - Select date and time| - Add reason for visit| - Confirmation displayed| - Confirmation email with calendar invite sent

Title: Cancel/Reschedule Appointment
Description: As a patient I want to cancel or reschedule my appointment so that I can manage schedule changes
Acceptance Criteria: - Cancel appointment 24h+ in advance| - Provide cancellation reason| - Cancellation confirmation email| - Reschedule to another slot| - Late cancellation warning| - Cancellation policy displayed

Title: Virtual Visit (Telehealth)
Description: As a patient I want to join virtual appointments so that I can receive care remotely
Acceptance Criteria: - Join virtual visit from appointment page| - Join button enabled 10 min before| - Video/audio permissions requested| - Test camera/mic before joining| - Waiting room if provider not joined| - Connection quality indicator| - Can end call anytime

Title: Medical Records Access
Description: Automated testing for accessing and downloading medical records lab results and visit summaries

Title: View Lab Results
Description: As a patient I want to view my lab results so that I can stay informed about my health
Acceptance Criteria: - View all lab results| - Show test name date value reference range| - Out-of-range values highlighted| - Filter by date or test type| - Provider notes displayed| - Download as PDF| - New results flagged for 7 days

Title: View Visit Summaries
Description: As a patient I want to view summaries of my past visits so that I can review what was discussed and decided
Acceptance Criteria: - View list of visit summaries| - Summary includes date provider diagnosis treatment plan| - View full visit notes| - Download as PDF| - Print summary| - Available within 24h of visit

Title: View Medications
Description: As a patient I want to view my current and past medications so that I can track my prescriptions
Acceptance Criteria: - View active medications list| - View medication history| - Show name dosage frequency prescriber| - Refill status displayed| - Request refill if eligible| - View medication instructions

Title: Download Medical Records
Description: As a patient I want to download my complete medical records so that I can share them with other providers
Acceptance Criteria: - Request full medical record download| - Includes all notes labs imaging meds| - PDF and/or CCD format| - Available within 24h| - Email notification when ready| - Link expires after 7 days| - Audit log created

Title: Prescriptions & Pharmacy
Description: Automated testing for prescription refills and pharmacy management

Title: Request Prescription Refill
Description: As a patient I want to request prescription refills online so that I don't run out of medication
Acceptance Criteria: - View refillable prescriptions| - Select prescriptions to refill| - Select preferred pharmacy| - Add new pharmacy| - Confirmation displayed| - Notification when ready| - Sent to provider for approval

Title: View Prescription History
Description: As a patient I want to view my prescription history so that I can track what medications I've taken
Acceptance Criteria: - View all past prescriptions| - Show med name dosage date provider| - Filter by date or type| - View refill history| - Discontinued meds marked

Title: Billing & Payments
Description: Automated testing for viewing bills making payments and setting up payment plans

Title: View Bills and Statements
Description: As a patient I want to view my medical bills and statements so that I know what I owe
Acceptance Criteria: - View all bills| - Show service date provider amount due date status| - View detailed breakdown| - Filter by date or status| - Download as PDF| - Insurance claim status displayed

Title: Make a Payment
Description: As a patient I want to pay my medical bills online so that I can settle my account conveniently
Acceptance Criteria: - Pay full or partial amount| - Pay with credit/debit card| - Pay with bank account (ACH)| - Save payment methods| - Immediate confirmation| - Receipt via email| - Payment reflected in 1 business day

Title: Set Up Payment Plan
Description: As a patient with a large bill I want to set up a payment plan so that I can pay over time
Acceptance Criteria: - Request payment plan for bills $500+| - Select duration (3 6 12 months)| - Monthly amount calculated| - Set up autopay| - Accept payment plan agreement| - Confirmation email| - Reminder before each payment

Title: Messaging & Communication
Description: Automated testing for messaging with providers and viewing message history

Title: Send Message to Provider
Description: As a patient I want to send non-urgent messages to my healthcare provider so that I can ask questions without calling
Acceptance Criteria: - Compose new message to provider| - Select provider from care team| - Select message category| - Attach files/images (10MB max)| - 2000 character limit| - Confirmation sent| - Notified when provider responds| - Response time expectation displayed

Title: View Message History
Description: As a patient I want to view my message history with providers so that I can reference past conversations
Acceptance Criteria: - View sent and received messages| - Organized by conversation thread| - Search by keyword| - Filter by provider or date| - Unread messages highlighted| - Timestamps included| - Download attachments

Title: Forms & Documents
Description: Automated testing for completing pre-visit forms and signing consent documents

Title: Complete Pre-Visit Forms
Description: As a patient with an upcoming appointment I want to complete forms before my visit so that I can save time at the office
Acceptance Criteria: - Notified of required forms| - Complete forms online| - Forms include history symptoms meds| - Progress auto-saved| - Review and edit before submit| - E-signature captured| - Confirmation displayed| - Provider receives form

Title: Sign Consent Forms
Description: As a patient I want to review and sign consent forms electronically so that I can provide informed consent conveniently
Acceptance Criteria: - View consent forms from provider| - Full text displayed before signing| - Download for review| - E-signature captured| - Stored in patient record| - Copy via email| - Audit trail maintained

Title: Insurance & Coverage
Description: Automated testing for viewing and updating insurance information

Title: View Insurance Information
Description: As a patient I want to view my insurance information so that I can verify coverage details
Acceptance Criteria: - View primary insurance details| - View secondary insurance if applicable| - Insurance card images displayed| - Coverage includes group number member ID copay| - Verify provider network status| - Insurance verification status shown

Title: Update Insurance Information
Description: As a patient with new insurance I want to update my insurance information so that claims are processed correctly

Title: Mobile App Features
Description: Automated testing for mobile app installation login and push notifications

Description: As a patient I want to use the patient portal on my mobile device so that I can manage my healthcare on the go
Acceptance Criteria: - Available on iOS and Android| - Download from App Store/Play Store| - Same credentials as web| - Biometric login available| - Push notifications enabled by default| - Real-time sync with web

Title: Push Notifications
Description: As a patient using the mobile app I want to receive push notifications so that I'm alerted to important updates

Title: Accessibility & Compliance
Description: Automated testing for WCAG compliance and HIPAA security requirements

Title: WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance
Description: As a patient with disabilities I want to use the portal with assistive technologies so that I can access my healthcare information independently
Acceptance Criteria: - Pass WCAG 2.1 AA standards| - Screen reader navigation works| - Proper form labels| - Color contrast meets requirements| - Keyboard navigation throughout| - Alt text for images| - ARIA labels implemented

Title: HIPAA Compliance
Description: As a healthcare organization I want to ensure the portal is HIPAA compliant so that patient data is protected
Acceptance Criteria: - Data encrypted in transit (TLS 1.2+)| - PHI encrypted at rest| - Audit logs for all access| - 30 min session timeout| - Failed login attempts logged| - BAAs in place| - Privacy policy displayed and accepted
